description: Allen-Bradley 2711P-T12C4A1 PanelView Plus 1250 Color Terminal 12.1 inch, Touch Screen, Standard Communication (Ethernet and RS-232), 64 MB Flash, 64 MB RAM, AC power, Series A
miscellaneous: The Allen-Bradley 2711P-T12C4A1 PanelView Plus uses additional modular components allowing for flexible configuration, installation, and upgrades. The field replaceable 12.1-inch flat-panel color displays come with keypad, analog touch screen, or keypad/touch screen input. To meet more stringent environmental conditions, high-bright, conformal-coated, and marine certified display modules are also available.
